signin.title: Sign in to SaveSphere
signin.message: Enter your email address to sign in or create an account.

form.name: Name
form.passwordMessage: <min>Password must be at least 8 characters long</min><max>Password must be less than 100 characters</max><upper>Password must contain at least one uppercase letter</upper><lower>Password must contain at least one lowercase letter</lower><number>Password must contain at least one number</number><special>Password must contain a special character</special>
form.terms: I accept the <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>

footer.title: Welcome to SaveSphere.
footer.message: By continuing, you agree to SaveSphere's <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy.</privacy>
